file_content.text: A Jedi's limits must always be put to the test.
Helping others is both a duty and an honor.
I've dedicated my life to serving others.
I will face down all darkness in the galaxy.
May the Force be with you.
The Force will guide me.
The Jedi way is to serve.
On the word of myself and my order.
The best way to win is by not fighting.
May the Force be with you.
As a soldier of the Republic, it's my duty to help.
For the Republic!
Dangerous missions are what I do best. I'm in.
Now you'll see how Havoc Squad gets things done.
I'm a soldier--I'll get the job done.
I've been meaning to get some exercise.
I could charm the horns off a krayt dragon.
I could see things your way--for the right money.
I wasn't planning to live forever anyway. I'm in.
I don't take orders from anybody.
Now you'll see what a Sith is capable of.
It's useless to defy me.
I will bring the Republic to its knees.
Looks like it's time for a bloodbath.
Time to rage.
Now that wasn't so bad, was it?
That's not fear I smell, is it?
That's somewhat intriguing.
I suppose I can lower myself to do this.
Just show me where the fun is.
Bounty hunters set their own rules.
I'm always a professional.
If there's payment involved, I'm interested.
Pleasure doing business with you.
Just point me in the direction of the action.
I'm very good at my work.
I'm a loyal servant of the Empire.
You'd better not be wasting my time.
This should be interesting.
My activities are authorized by Imperial Intelligence.
